translations: 恶棍，无赖；说脏话的人；无赖般的（作修饰语）

sentences.sentence: In the first moment of fear, he called, indeed, as loud as he could—"You impudent little blackguard!"
sentences.translation: 在他害怕那一刻，用最大的声音喊道：“你这个无礼的小坏蛋！”
黑色卫士(blackguard)指的是一个恶棍。

sentences.sentence: This letter will only make them think me a blackguard one.
sentences.translation: 这封信不过使他们把我想得下流而已。
